targets.expr:
sum by (node)(label_replace(instance:node_cpu:ratio + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info,"node","$1","nodename", "(.+)") ) / sum by (node)(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu"})

sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_complete{namespace="default"} + on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
)

sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_failed{namespace="default"} + on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
)
